Text.Page:
[Mysterious agenda]

If you want to live your life by your own rules, and not obey weaklings, {@LinkCreature:63#1260} waiting for you in Velika.

I see you have a couple of fights under your belt.

If you have the recklessness and courage to attack anyone you want, whenever you want, talk to a man named {@LinkCreature:63#1172} near the Legion School.

He will tell you what to do next.

Law and order enforcement organizations were created by sheep in order to control wolves. Sheep are happy with their lives. And you?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"And I'm definitely not one of them.".</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Then grab your luck by the tail, my friend. You can use force if you need to.

After reading Outlaw's Declaration, you can choose your own path to power.

You'll be outlawed, mind you. You can attack people, but they can also attack you. The gods protect the truly weak, but why would you bother with weaklings?"I love real challenges".

Be careful, my friend, the more you kill, the higher the chance of angering the gods. Notoriety spreads quickly.

A trifling sacrifice in exchange for freedom, in my opinion.

The choice is yours...
